name: Youssef Elsabbahy
title: Full Stack Web Developer

hero.description: I build engaging digital experiences and advanced web applications that combine high performance with creative design.

about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Full Stack Web Developer
about.shortDescription: A passionate developer with experience in PHP, Laravel, and JavaScript technologies
about.paragraph1: Full Stack Web Developer with 2+ years of experience in PHP (Native) and recent Laravel projects. Skilled in Blade templating and Vanilla JavaScript (especially AJAX). Familiar with Vue.js. Proficient in WordPress, Shopify, and Salla.
about.paragraph2: Domain and email configuration expert, including Gmail integration. Comfortable using Canva and AI tools for visual content. ICDL-certified in Word, Excel, and PowerPoint.
about.skillsDescription: Technologies and tools I work with

projects.title: My Projects
projects.subtitle: A collection of projects that showcase my skills and expertise in web development

project1.title: EcooShield – Pest Control Landing Page
project1.description: A modern landing page for a pest control company with animated visuals and responsive layout.

project2.title: Emaar AlMsakin – Real Estate Website
project2.description: Complete real estate company website with property listings, contact form, and SEO-optimized pages.

project3.title: The IOU Project – NFT Art Showcase
project3.description: A creative and animated site for an NFT collection, focused on storytelling and Web3 aesthetics.

project4.title: Giant Whale – Portfolio Website
project4.description: Company portfolio website showcasing design and dev services for the Saudi market.

project5.title: Ibra Academy – Arabic Educational Template
project5.description: An educational template built in Arabic RTL format for online courses.

project6.title: Fleex Task – To-Do App Interface
project6.description: A simple task management interface with animated interactions.

project7.title: Helpfererhof – Austrian Tourism Website
project7.description: A professional tourism and booking website built for a guesthouse in Austria.

project8.title: Bold Portfolio Template
project8.description: Dark-themed modern portfolio template for creative developers.

project9.title: Yousef Portfolio (Old)
project9.description: A previous portfolio version with basic layout and demo projects.

project10.title: Agricultural Talent – Job Platform
project10.description: A Laravel-based platform to connect agriculture companies with job seekers.

project11.title: Estisharati – Online Consulting CRM
project11.description: A modern CRM to manage online consultation bookings and expert scheduling.

project12.title: Party Wizard – Event Supplies Store
project12.description: An eCommerce project for renting party items online, built in Laravel.

project13.title: KSA Lawyers – Legal Portal
project13.description: A legal services website in Arabic with categorized lawyers and contact tools.

project14.title: Tmatem – Arabic Recipes & Products Store
project14.description: A custom Arabic food site with recipe content and WooCommerce features.
